artist: Artist: Renée French; Printer: Westcan, Winnipeg, Canada; Publisher: Sparkplug Books, Portland, Ore.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Perfect bound volume, letterpress text and a close-up detail of a photograph of a pencil illustration printed in color offset lithography on wove paper covers; 88 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: Edison Steelhead's Lost Portfolio: Exploratory Studies of Girls and Rabbits
